channel.title: VPS help
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: /;//jython/jar;//MySq l/mysql-connector-java-3/0/17-ga-bin/jar Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: .;..jython.jar;..MySql.mysql-connec tor-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: server 7-ga-bin.jar. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
This is the error i got from my Vps Telenim i already searched at google for over 7 paginas.
this is what my runner is :
@Echo off Title Rune-Remedy "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" server pause
Help thanks![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2009, 12:49:10 am[/size][hr]BTW it runns perfectly on my own PC
